name: redisy
description:
This is an experimental simple calm sandbox simulation. 

There are dark resources, coloured catalysts and products and spiky inhibitors. Resources are converted by catalysts into products. Two resources become one product. Products are reduced to resources by inhibitors. One product becomes two resources.

You can move your player to create/ assimilate/ remove catalysts and inhibitors.

This is based on a reaction diffusion system simulator, but scientifically not exactly. This was created by playing around, trying to find some game mechanics.

v1.0 Initial version with random population but same attributes.

v1.1 Random population with different attributes. New graphics. v1.1.1 Minor bug fixits
